title: Single base pair mutations, Sickle Cell 1

content.question: Explain how a single base-pair mutant in DNA can alter the structure and, in some cases, the function of a protein.

frqParts.text: Explain how a single base-pair mutant in DNA can alter the structure and, in some cases, the function of a protein.

skill.text: 1.C: Explain biological concepts and processes in applied contexts.
